careers.title: Join Us
careers.description: Bringing intelligent, versatile robots into reality.

about.title: About Us
about.content: Astribot was founded in Shenzhen in December 2022. As a leading AI robotics company, our vision is to empower billions of people with AI robotic partners, and our mission is to promote co-existence, co-creation and co-prosperity between humans and robots.
about.nextcontent: The company has pioneered a software-hardware integrated system architecture for AI (Design for AI, DFAI), deeply coupling 'AI capabilities' with 'optimal manipulation'. This innovation has led to key breakthroughs in embodied intelligence and data acquisition, enabling robots to learn, think, and work like humans while fostering smooth and intelligent interactions with people.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Contact Us
contact.description: If you want to become an industry partner, please fill in the information first.

performance.title: Our new AI humanoid robot brings more service possibilities

performance.description2: deeply coupling 'AI capabilities' with 'optimal operation', This innovation enables S1 to learn, think, and work more like humans

specs.title: Human-like abilities, Greater creativity
specs.description1: Astribot S1 mirrors an adult male's operational parameters, delivering exceptional performance, stability
specs.description2: and safety - empowering researchers and explorers to bring imagination to life

comparison.note: *This version is designed for scientific research, with select parameters unlockable for enhanced performance

toolchain.description1: Optimize onboard toolchains to create an open
toolchain.description2: efficient ecosystem - accelerating the development and validation of cutting-edge algorithms and models

teleoperation.title: VR Teleoperation: Let Astribot Become Your AI Training Partner

video_detail.desc: Zero-code Astribot UI, Master in Minutes
Multimodal Fusion, Comprehensive Perception of the Real Environment
Cutting-Edge Force-Control Technology, Safeguarding Every Operation Second
Precise Reproduction, Superior Simulation for Training Effectiveness
Data-Driven AI Models, Smarter with Use
Zero-code operation with a single click

cases.title: Join Hands to Co-create, Evolve Infinitely

partners.name: Physical Intelligence
partners.desc: For enterprises focusing on AI and embodied models, Astribot provides solutions at the data and model levels to assist in model verification and enhance generalization ability

partners.name: Data collection
partners.desc: For data collection centers and industry research institutes, Astribot has launched a VR teleoperation data collection solution, which is efficient, comfortable, simple, and safe

partners.name: Universities
partners.desc: For universities and research institutions, Astribot continuously improves the intelligent robot and toolchain to create a more convenient development environment for researchers

ecosystem.title: Join us and together Drive the Global Transformation towards Embodied Intelligence
ecosystem.vision: Embodied intelligent robots present a world-class challenge and a once-in-a-centry opportunity. Together with our industry partners, we will move forward to continuously evolve.

sections.title: Science Breakthroughs
sections.desc: By leveraging the 'intelligent robot + toolchain + data', we assist universities, data centers, and AI enterprises to achieve scientific research breakthroughs, driving the transformative development of embodied intelligence

sections.title: Industry Intelligent Transformation
sections.desc: We collaborate with industry partners to explore practical pathways for embodied AI adoption from foundational breakthroughs to real-world applications.

sections.title: End-User Application Exploration
sections.desc: Our vision is to enable billions of people to have AI robotic partner. Focusing on universality, cost, safety, etc., we're paving the way for application explosion

news.title: news
news.subtitle: Latest updates and announcements from Astribot

news1.title: Celebrate the First Intangible Cultural Heritage Spring Festival with Astribot S1
news1.description: Celebrate the inaugural 'Intangible Cultural Heritage Chinese New Year' with Astribot S1, and immerse yourself in the world's cultural treasures.

news2.title: In-Depth｜Astribot secures $400M from Top Investors, teams up with PI: The robot's Jarvis is Here!
news2.description: Recently, Physical Intelligence and Astribot have announced a partnership to collaborate at the data and model levels, promoting the entry of general artificial intelligence into the physical world and jointly building world models.

news3.title: Astribot 2025 Campus Recruitment Officially Opened
news3.description: We envision a future where billions of people will own Al robotic partner. To achieve this, we have gathered a group of extreme technology enthusiasts. Now, join us! Let's head towards the starry sea of the AI robot era together!

news4.title: At the World Robot Conference, this domestically produced robot carrying the hope of future elderly care was surrounded
news4.description: At the World Robot Conference being held in Beijing, the display of humanoid robots became the absolute focus of the event. At the booth of Astribot, due to Al robotic partner S1 performs yangqin (Chinese dulcimer) in an exhibition area.

news5.title: Astribot is pleased to officially release its Al robotic partner Astribot S1
news5.description: At the World Robot Conference being held in Beijing, the display of humanoid robots became the absolute focus of the event. At the booth of Astribot, due to Al robotic partner S1 performs yangqin (Chinese dulcimer) in an exhibition area.We have carefully polished the technology and product details behind S1, hoping that it is born for you and naturally intelligent for you...

news6.title: Astribot is pleased to introduce you to the new generation of AI robot Astribot S1
news6.description: Setting a new benchmark for AI robotics, S1 delivers better operational performance in its class. It learns, thinks, and performs tasks like a human, truly embodying Naturally Yours.
